notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by the following funding agencies: Promotion project of basic ability of young and middle-aged teachers in colleges and universities in Guangxi (No.2017KY1368 and No.2018KY0861); The National Natural Science Foundation of China (No.NSFC81603525); Guangxi Natural Science Foundation (No.2017GXNSFAA198171); State Key Laboratory Cultivation Base for the Chemistry and Molecular Engineeringof Medicinal Resources, Ministry of Science and Technology of China (CMEMR2015 -B04 and CMEMR2015-B05).
